verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) - President Donald Trump [V: is] paying tribute to his late mother , Mary MacLeod , in a Mother 's Day video posted to his Twitter account .
WASHINGTON ( AP ) - [ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [V: paying] [ARG1: tribute] [ARG2: to his late mother , Mary MacLeod] , [ARGM-LOC: in a Mother 's Day video posted to his Twitter account] .
WASHINGTON ( AP ) - President Donald Trump is paying tribute to his late mother , Mary MacLeod , in [ARG1: a Mother 's Day video] [V: posted] [ARG2: to his Twitter account] .
